text: The discus throw event at the Olympics of Grace was held in Florence at the ASSI Giglio Rosso from 30 to 31 May 1931 consisting of the qualification during the morning session on 30 May and the final during the afternoon session on 31 May. ==Schedule== All times are local time. Date Time Round 30 May 1931 15:15 Qualification 31 May 1931 17:30 Final ==Results== ===Qualification=== The qualification took place in the morning session starting at 30:30am (local time). The top six athletes of the qualification qualified for the final. Only the athletes who qualified for the final are listed. Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 33.865 m Q 2 33.56 m Q 3 Liesl Perkaus 32.11 m Q 4 Tilly Fleischer 31.95 m Q 5 Vera Neferović 31.90 m Q 6 Františka Vodičkova 30.06 m Q ? ? ===Final=== The final of the discus throw event took place during the afternoon session at 18:00 (local time). Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 36.51 m Tilly Fleischer 34.47 m 34.38 m 4 Liesl Perkaus 32.90 m 5 Vera Neferović 32.40 m 6 Františka Vodičkova 30.61 m ==Related pages== *Athletics at the 1930 Women's World Games – discus throw *Athletics at the 1934 Women's World Games – discus throw ==References== Category:Athletics at the Olympics of Grace
title: Athletics at the Olympics of Grace – discus throw
